Tips: You can attack a titan's legs to cripple them.
You can blind a titan by attacking the eyes.
Use the N key to emote.
Use the F key to use items such as flares.
Make sure to check your keybinds for potentially useful abilities
Be careful, one titan is dangerous a horde is death.
Always keep your comrades within earshot or atleast line of sight for flares.
Defend wagons and cannons as both can be destroyed by titans
Stay vigilant and subjugate the titan threat to humanity!
May the walls protect you.
Keep an eye out for abnormals, they may target one player specifically and that player could be you.
In a dire situation both thrown blades and thunderspears can be parried with a melee attack
Make sure to use the titans weak points to your advantage, sometimes the nape is too risky.
Be cautious of the location of your horse, if lost the whistle can be used to call them.
Defend your horses with your life, if PVP is enabled they can be killed as well.
The new cannons have munition types, check your keybinds to swap them.
Enjoy the present as you never know when it will no longer be here.
If you hear a howl in the night, find a high place and hide
Check your stats and items with right alt
The MC has access to a menu with a variety of options, access it with right control
Sometimes its best to be hidden, with realism on the hood hides player names.
I don't know much at all, not in the grand scheme of things
Keep an eye out for blood stains, what caused them may still be around.
If your horse dies you can always get on wagons or your comrades horse.
